valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Sun 7 Dec 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Mon 8 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Developing Atlantic low moving rather quickly northeast, expected Forties 985 by midnight tonight

Forties.text:
Wind
In northeast, easterly or southeasterly 5 to 7, occasionally gale 8. In southwest, southwesterly 2 to 4 backing southeasterly 5 or 6, becoming cyclonic 7 to severe gale 9 later.
Sea state
In northeast, moderate or rough. in southwest, moderate, becoming rough or very rough later.
Weather
In northeast, rain or showers. In southwest, showers then rain.
Visibility
In northeast, good, occasionally poor. In southwest, moderate or good, becoming poor for a time.
Forties.gale_warning:
Gale warning
Issued:
03:50 (UTC) on Sun 7 Dec 2025
Gale now ceased but southwesterly severe gale force 9 expected later
